nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: We have reached the periphery, Captain. The star charts call this region 'The Fracture.' Before us lies a sphere of absolute darkness, orbited by the debris of countless ships and satellites. The space between us and it is a maelstrom of gravitational eddies.

choices.text: [Reconnaissance] Launch a probe into the eddies. I want hard data.
Chen, can you find a stable path through that nightmare?
Torres, tactical. What are we looking at?
[Previous Loop] "There's a null-current that flows just below the ecliptic. It's a blind spot. Take us there."

nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: Probe launched. It's transmitting... The eddies are not natural. They are being generated by a network of cloaked energy sources. The probe also detected a derelict ship, pre-Federation design, caught in a stable orbit within the storm.

nodes.speaker: navigator_chen
nodes.body_language: Chen's hands are trembling slightly as they grip their console.
nodes.text: Captain, the gravimetric shear is off the charts. Every path I plot degrades in seconds. A 'stable' path doesn't exist. We can try to surf the waves, but one wrong move...

nodes.speaker: first_officer_torres
nodes.text: This is a fortress, Captain. The eddies are a defensive perimeter. Whatever is in that sphere doesn't want visitors. I recommend we go in hot, weapons charged. Let them know we're not prey.

nodes.speaker: navigator_chen
nodes.text: A null-current? There's nothing on my charts... but the Captain has been right before. I... I'll trust you, Captain. Plotting course.

nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: Our presence has not gone unnoticed. I am detecting faint scanning pulses from the sphere. They are... passive. For now. Your orders, Captain?

choices.text: [Piloting] Skirt the edge of the storm. Slow and steady.
[Press Further] Punch through the middle. Maximum power to the shields.
[Second Thoughts] This is too risky. Pull us back. We'll find another way.

nodes.speaker: navigator_chen
nodes.text: We're through the worst of it. They scanned us multiple times, but the interference from the eddies seems to have masked our full capabilities. We're in.

nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: The eddy was stronger than anticipated! We've been pulled off course, directly into the patrol route of a Watcher vessel!

nodes.speaker: first_officer_torres
nodes.text: Now you're talking! Let's give them a show.

nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: We have cleared the storm. Hull integrity at 87%. We are through, but they are definitely aware of us now. Multiple Watcher ships are moving to intercept.

nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: Channel open. A response, not in language, but pure data. A request for identification... and a deep, invasive scan.

choices.text: Send them our standard Federation ID. Let's see what they do.
[Bluff] Send the ID of that derelict ship we found. Tell them we're scavengers.
[Tech] Resist their scan! Encrypt our systems!

nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: They have accepted the false ID. Their scans have become less focused. They are classifying us as 'non-threat, low priority.' They are warning us to stay clear of the sphere.

nodes.speaker: ship_ai_maya
nodes.text: Encryption held. Their scan was unable to penetrate our core systems. They have marked us as 'unknown, potential threat' and are moving to establish a cordon.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: A vessel of crystalline design, impossibly large, emerges from the darkness to block your path. A voice that is many voices echoes in your mind: 'You are not welcome here. Turn back, or be unmade.'

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You slipped through the storm unnoticed. The darkness of Fractured Space awaits.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You forced your way through, drawing the attention of the Watchers. You are no longer an unknown.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: Your quick thinking has allowed you to pass as harmless scavengers. The Watchers have dismissed you.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You repelled their mental intrusion, marking yourself as a power to be respected... or eliminated.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: Your foreknowledge from another life gave you a secret passage, bypassing the Watchers completely.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You have come face to face with a Watcher. A new, dangerous chapter has begun.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You deemed the risk too great and pulled back. The secrets of the Fracture will have to wait for another loop.
